description.en: BSBT - Bit Storage Box Token is issued by the integration between BSB platform – giving reward with cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology. BSBT Token is issued based on ERC-20 with a total issue of 1 billion tokens. Besides, BSBT Token is the main currency in the BSBT platform, serving as the typical electronic asset for the settlement and converting tokens in the platform In BSB platfrom, users can answer, share, create quizzes and surveys in the BSBT platform, thereby receiving rewards of BSBT or Bitcoin. BSBT convert fastly and conveniently, similar to some typical cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc...
